title: System-Based Data Augmentation and Transfer Learning for PHM (Prognostics and Health Management) Diagnostic Technology Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Case study-driven project-based learning to enhance PHM technology design capabilities for practitioners

learning_goals: Quantifying diagnostic uncertainty of existing systems and enabling transfer learning to new systems using domain adaptation techniques
Deriving system design solutions even with small datasets through designable data augmentation techniques
Validating the performance of PHM diagnostic design solutions using Modelica-based physical models
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
